ふ…震えてない？\.震えが止まった！
\.ばんざぁ～い！<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/24]
message.ko_KR: 돼... 됐나?\. 흔들림이 멎었어!\. 야호!<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/24]

message.en_US: This feeling... It's liberating and peaceful at once.\. \v[lore.title.seeker], I can't thank you enough.
message.pt_BR: Esse sentimento... É libertador e pacífico ao mesmo tempo.\. \v[lore.title.seeker], não tenho palavras para agradecer.
message.de_DE: Was für ein unbeschreibliches Gefühl... So befreiend und friedlich zugleich.\. Seeker, ich kann dir gar nicht genug danken!
message.zh_CN: 这种...自由又平静的感觉。\.\v[lore.title.seeker]，敢问恩人尊姓大名？<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/19]
message.zh_TW: \v[lore.title.seeker]，你回來了。\.看來項目總算有了進展，謝謝你！<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/19]
message.ja_JP:
この感じ…解放されて、すごく穏やかよ。
\.\v[lore.title.seeker]さん、あなたには
感謝してもしきれない。<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/24]
message.ko_KR: 이 느낌... 마침내 자유롭고 평화로워졌어.\. \v[lore.title.seeker], 정말 고마워.<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/24]

message.en_US: Lea.
message.pt_BR: Lea.
message.de_DE: Lea.

message.en_US: Well, you can take the completed weapon with you!\. It is immensely powerful and that curse is lifted too!
message.pt_BR: Bem, você pode levar a arma pronta com você!\. É imensamente poderosa e essa maldição é anulada também!
message.de_DE: Also, du kannst die fertige Waffen gerne haben!\. Sie ist ziemlich stark und nun auch nicht mehr verflucht!
message.zh_CN: 那这把武器就交给你了！\.它吸收了诅咒的能量，变得更加强大了！<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/19]
message.zh_TW: \v[lore.title.seeker]，你回來了。\.看來項目總算有了進展，謝謝你！<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/19]
message.ja_JP:
そうそう、完成した武器を持って行って
ちょうだい！\.すごく強力だし、
それにもう呪いは消えたわ！<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/24]
message.ko_KR: 완성된 무기는 가져가도 돼!\. 가공할 정도의 파괴력을 가졌고, 이젠 그 저주도 없어!<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/24]

message.en_US: And I could even make it \c[3]ascend\c[0] if you bring me the needed material.
message.pt_BR: E eu poderia até \c[3]melhora-la\c[0] se você me trouxer o material necessário.
message.de_DE: Ich könnte sogar eine \c[3]Elite-Waffe\c[0] daraus machen, wenn du mir das nötige Material dafür besorgst.
message.zh_CN: 另外，如果你为我带来材料，我还能将其进阶为\c[3]晋升\c[0]装备！<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/19]
message.zh_TW: \v[lore.title.seeker]，你回來了。\.看來項目總算有了進展，謝謝你！<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/19]
message.ja_JP:
あと、あなたが必要な材料を持って来て
くれるなら、\c[3]超越\c[0]にすることもできるわよ。<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/24]
message.ko_KR: 그리고 필요한 재료를 가지고 오면 \c[3]각성\c[0]시켜 줄게.<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/24]

message.en_US: Lea.\. Meet.\.\. ... Bye!
message.pt_BR: Lea.\. Encontrar.\.\. ... Tchau!
message.de_DE: Lea.\. Treffen.\.\. ... Bye!

message.en_US: Yes, goodbye.\. And thank you again.
message.pt_BR: Sim, tchau.\. E mais uma vez, obrigado.
message.de_DE: Ja, auf Wiedersehen.\. Und vielen, vielen Dank nochmal!
message.zh_CN: 嗯，再见。\.再次感谢你的帮助。<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/19]
message.zh_TW: \v[lore.title.seeker]，你回來了。\.看來項目總算有了進展，謝謝你！<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/19]
message.ja_JP: うん、さようなら。\.本当にありがとう。<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/24]
message.ko_KR: 응, 잘 가.\. 다시 한번 고마워.<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/24]

message.en_US: Hey, \v[lore.title.seeker], how are you?\. Want me to work on the weapon?
message.pt_BR: Ei, \v[lore.title.seeker], como você está?\. Quer que eu trabalhe na arma?
message.de_DE: Hey, Seeker, wie geht's?\. Soll ich mit der Arbeit an der Waffe beginnen?
message.zh_CN: 莉亚小姐你好！\.需要我帮你打造武器吗？<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/19]
message.zh_TW: 你好，\v[lore.title.seeker]。\.我們目前暫時不需要你的幫助。<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/19]
message.ja_JP:
こんにちは、\v[lore.title.seeker]さん。
ご機嫌いかが？\.武器を作ってほしい？<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/24]
message.ko_KR: 안녕, \v[lore.title.seeker]. 잘 지냈어?\. 무기를 각성시켜 줄까?<<A<<[CHANGED 2021/02/24]
